templates.desc: Total sales in DEPARTMENTGROUP_PARAMETER last week.
questions: What were my total sales in DEPARTMENTGROUP_PARAMETER last week?
templates.query: SELECT CONCAT('The total sales last week for the ', A.SALES_DEPARTMENT_GROUP_DISPLAY_LABEL,' department is $', LTRIM(TO_VARCHAR(SUM(OP.NET_SALES_DOLLARS_TY), '999,999,999,990')) ) FROM PC."Opportunity_Locator" OP JOIN PC.LKP_SALES_DEPARTMENT_GROUP A ON OP.SALES_DEPARTMENT_GROUP_ID = A.SALES_DEPARTMENT_GROUP_ID WHERE A.SALES_DEPARTMENT_GROUP_ID = DEPARTMENTGROUP_PARAMETER AND OP.TIMEFRAME_ID = 10 AND OP.USED_IN_METRICS = TRUE GROUP BY A.SALES_DEPARTMENT_GROUP_DISPLAY_LABEL;
